abstract: Rachel Maddow said she would likely reshape her new show as more of a general news program after “this political Christmas” has come to an end.
snippet: Rachel Maddow said she would likely reshape her new show as more of a general news program after “this political Christmas” has come to an end.
lead_paragraph: In a telephone interview on Tuesday, Rachel Maddow discussed her new role as the 9 p.m. host on MSNBC.

headline.main: Rachel Maddow Comments on New Role
